title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 53.8 - Access to records
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13 ยง 53.8 - Access to records

State Regulations

All records required to be kept pursuant to this section shall be preserved for a
period of not less than one year subsequent to the date of performance to which such record relates, and shall be made available for inspection upon
request to duly authorized agents of the Department of Law at the premises of the theatre, stadium, garden, arena or other place where theatre or
sporting events are held, or pursuant to a subpoena at the office of the Department of Law. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 13
ยง
53.8

Amended

New York State Register July 3, 2018/Volume XL, Issue 27, eff. 7/3/2018

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
